get.description: Account available, regular, generating and effective balance
Get the regular balance of the address within {confirmations} blocks back from the current height. {confirmations} supports return of balance not more than 2,000 blocks back
Get effective balance at the address of {confirmations} blocks from the current height. {confirmations} supports return of balance not more than 2000 blocks back
Read data stored in account by key
Get block by its signature
Get block by its id
Get genesis block
Get list of blocks generated by specified address. Max range {from}-{to} is 100 blocks
Get blocks at specified heights. Max range {from}-{to} is 100 blocks
Average delay in milliseconds between last `blockNum` blocks starting from block with `id`

parameters.name: blockNum
parameters.description: Number of blocks to count delay
